issue.title: [Rust]: Safe bit operations for Arrow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10588](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10588). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement bit operations over the safe interface with checks instead of using unsafe operations.

Expose better API to users. Extends ARROW-10535.
